doc:
Raymond Allen (stage actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Raymond_Allen_(stage_actor) 0 Raymond Allen (c.1921 – January 29, 1994) was an American stage actor who was best known for his performances in Gilbert and Sullivan and other light operas from the 1950s through the 1980s. He spent most of his career with the American Savoyards and later the Light Opera of Manhattan. Raymond_Allen ( c. 1921 – January_29_,_1994 ) was an_American_stage_actor who was_best_known for his_performances in Gilbert_and_Sullivan and other_light_operas from the_1950s through the_1980s . He spent most of his_career with the_American_Savoyards and later the_Light_Opera of Manhattan .
